message.content: cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MED, cs.NEURON - The paper presents an automatic image segmentation method based on dilated convolutional networks (DCNN) for cardiac MRI. This involves the use of deep learning techniques for image analysis, which falls under the computer vision (cs.CV) and machine learning (cs.LG) sub-categories. The paper also discusses the use of Bayesian methods for uncertainty estimation, which is a topic of interest in the artificial intelligence (cs.AI) community. The application of the method to medical imaging and the use of human-in-the-loop evaluation suggest a focus on medical imaging (cs.MED) and possibly neuroscience (cs.NEURON) as well.
